title: How to access the library book worldwide from India - Quora

response.answer_text: In principle, if you are a member of one reputed Library, you are a member of almost all libraries. We have a system called inter library loan, and you can request the Librarian of yours to procure the book on inter library loan. Lending or not depends upon the lending library. Since I retired 18 years back as librarian,now it may be available on net or some thing. I have not updated myself in recent technology. Any way you contact the Librarian of your Library.
